subject: Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: When B. J. Upton’s sacrifice fly delivered pinch-runner Fernando Perez from third base, the Rays prevailed in 11 innings in Game 2 of the A.L.C.S.
snippet: When B. J. Upton’s sacrifice fly delivered pinch-runner Fernando Perez from third base, the Rays prevailed in 11 innings in Game 2 of the A.L.C.S.
